segments.text: I want to buy a parking permit , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you a full-time student or do you attend part-time in the evenings ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I attend both day and evening classes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you be riding a motorcycle or do you drive a car ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That permit will run twenty-five dollars ; will that be cash or credit card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll use a credit card , thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you need a second permit for a car ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , here it is and have a great semester !
segments.speaker: S2
